docs.snippet: One teenage son of a Miami-based Canadian diplomat was killed and a younger son is under arrest after they were involved in an alleged drug deal that turned into a gun battle, according to police records and the diplomat's ex-husband....
docs.lead_paragraph: One teenage son of a Miami-based Canadian diplomat was killed and a younger son is under arrest after they were involved in an alleged drug deal that turned into a gun battle, according to police records and the diplomat's ex-husband.

headline.main: Canadian Diplomat's Ex-Husband Says Their Son Killed in US
headline.print_headline: Canadian Diplomat's Ex-Husband Says Their Son Killed in US

docs.snippet: More than three decades ago, a 3-year-old South Korean boy and his sister flew to the U.S. to become the adopted children of American citizens, but their life together didn't last long....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than three decades ago, a 3-year-old South Korean boy and his sister flew to the U.S. to become the adopted children of American citizens, but their life together didn't last long.

headline.main: Adoptee From South Korea Faces Deportation From US
headline.print_headline: Adoptee From South Korea Faces Deportation From US

docs.snippet: Egypt and Nigeria accounted for well over 1,000 of the death sentences announced last year, more than a third of the world's total, Amnesty International says in its latest annual report on the death penalty....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egypt and Nigeria accounted for well over 1,000 of the death sentences announced last year, more than a third of the world's total, Amnesty International says in its latest annual report on the death penalty.

headline.main: Report: Egypt, Nigeria Led World in Death Sentences in 2014
headline.print_headline: Report: Egypt, Nigeria Led World in Death Sentences in 2014

docs.snippet: When Matt and seven traffickers lay face down and handcuffed in a luxury villa one afternoon last month, surrounded by Dominican police pointing guns at them, he knew the sting operation had been a success....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Matt and seven traffickers lay face down and handcuffed in a luxury villa one afternoon last month, surrounded by Dominican police pointing guns at them, he knew the sting operation had been a success.

headline.main: Dominican Republic Busts Child Sex Parties to Combat Trafficking
headline.print_headline: Dominican Republic Busts Child Sex Parties to Combat Trafficking
